name: Berkshire Hathaway Energy
description: Berkshire Hathaway Energy (BHE) is a subsidiary of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., focused on delivering reliable and sustainable energy solutions. Established in 1999, the company operates a diverse portfolio of energy businesses, including traditional electric and gas utilities, renewable energy projects, and energy infrastructure. BHE has a strong commitment to sustainability, investing heavily in renewable energy sources such as wind, solar, and geothermal, while also maintaining a robust conventional energy infrastructure. The company serves millions of customers across the United States and the United Kingdom, with a vision to provide energy that is not only dependable but also environmentally responsible. BHE's emphasis on clean energy aligns with global efforts to reduce carbon emissions and combat climate change. The company is committed to expanding its renewable energy capacity, with substantial investments in wind and solar energy projects. BHE's mission is to provide high-quality energy services while contributing to the safety and well-being of the communities it serves, ensuring that energy needs are met both now and in the future.
